name: Spicy Mayo for Sushi
description: Creamy, tangy, spicy, and garlic-y, this incredible supersauce that adorns many sushi rolls can be achieved with two simple cupboard staples—sriracha and mayonnaise.
recipeIngredient: 2 tablespoon Sriracha hot sauce, plus more to taste

recipeInstructions.text: In a small bowl, mix together mayonnaise, Sriracha, and lime juice. Taste and add more Sriracha to desired spiciness. Serve immediately or transfer to an airtight container and store in refrigerator for up to a month.
